entry.name: screenNo
entry.label: In which screen manage the windows (0 being the first etc)

entry.name: parkSide
entry.label: Which side to use as parking area.

entry.name: parkSize
entry.label: The percentage of screen to use as parking area (integer, min 10 max 40)

entry.name: paddingTop
entry.label: The space to reserve at the top of the work area

entry.name: paddingRight
entry.label: The space to reserve at the right of the work area

entry.name: paddingBottom
entry.label: The space to reserve at the bottom of the work area

entry.name: paddingLeft
entry.label: The space to reserve at the left of the work area

entry.name: filter
entry.label: The filter to match the windows to manage (a substring of the caption)

entry.name: whitelist
entry.label: One or more filters for windows to ignore (substrings of the caption)

entry.name: arrangeAll
entry.label: The shortcut to arrange all the matching windows

entry.name: raiseFirst
entry.label: The shortcut to raise the first parked window

entry.name: raiseLast
entry.label: The shortcut to raise the last parked window
